price: Kuma daga cikinsu akwai waɗanda suke cũtar Annabi, kuma sunã cẽwa "Shi kunne* ne." Ka ce: "Kunnen alhẽri gare ku, Yanã ĩmãni da Allah, kuma Yanã yarda da mũminai, kuma rahama ne ga waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni daga gare ku."Kuma waɗanda suke cũtar Manzon Allah sunã da Azãba mai raɗaɗi.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُنٞۚ قُلۡ أُذُنُ خَيۡرٖ لَّكُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَيُؤۡمِنُ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
footnotes: * Shi kunne ne, ma'anarsa, kome ka gaya masa Yanã gaskatawa, watau wai ba shi da wãyon gãne gaskiyã da ƙaryã. Sabõda haka Allah Ya ce: Kunnen alheri, watau ya san gaskiya kuma yana gaskata ta, kuma ya san ƙarya, ba ya aiki da ita.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin'humu alladhīna yu'dhūna al-nabiya wayaqūlūna huwa udhunun qul udhunu khayrin lakum yu'minu bil-lahi wayu'minu lil'mu'minīna waraḥmatun lilladhīna āmanū minkum wa-alladhīna yu'dhūna rasūla al-lahi lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
